tooltip.realmofdestiny.change_stone: Partial blocks can be converted into specific blocks
tooltip.realmofdestiny.pedestal0: Can be displayed as items and used to make special recipes
tooltip.realmofdestiny.pedestal1: Can be used to make special recipes
tooltip.realmofdestiny.structure_viewer: Right click on the pedestal to view the structure
tip.realmofdestiny.clear_structure: The preview structure has been cleared
There should be Bolt Leaves directly above the pedestal,and there should be no obstruction
book.realmofdestiny.name: Realm of Destiny
book.realmofdestiny.landing_text: Welcome to the Realm of Destiny! Here, you can find various information that can help you on your journey.
Please refer to JEI for other requirements
book.realmofdestiny.pedestal.name: Pedestal Generator Multiblock
book.realmofdestiny.pedestal.desc: This multiblock structure allows the pedestal to produce items with corresponding recipes.
book.realmofdestiny.items.name: Items
book.realmofdestiny.items.desc: Understand the purpose of the item
book.realmofdestiny.items.pedestale.name: Pedestal
book.realmofdestiny.items.pedestal.text0: Produce items in container adjacent to the pedestal$(br2)1. The correct structure is required$(br2)2. Corresponding items are required (not consumed)$(br2)3. Consume FE
book.realmofdestiny.items.pedestal.text1: The main/off hand with the item and right-click on the pedestal to place the item on it$(br2)shift + right-click on the pedestal to remove items from it$(br2)Tip: When both the main and off hand have something, prioritize judging the main hand
book.realmofdestiny.items.change_stone.t: By holding this stone and right clicking on the block that can be changed, it can be changed into the corresponding new block$(br2)Please refer to JEI for detailed recipes and chance
